nodes.text: Jak Sivrak was a male individual who lived during the era of the New Republic. Sivrak served as the announcer of the races that were held on the Colossus refueling platform on the ocean planet of Castilon.

Jak Sivrak is a character created and developed for the Star Wars Resistance animated series, and is voiced by Greg Proops, who previously voiced Fode in The Phantom Menace and Tal Merrik in The Clone Wars. Sivrak's name is a play on the name Lak Sivrak.
